content: /=Bolverk and Sigbjorn leave with Eyvind, who goes willingly, signaling that he's fine.=/
[bolverk] I don't care where you go, but stirring up trouble is probably the only reason you'll see me again. It won't be to talk.
[bolverk] I guess the mender will do. Either we've got a chance now or we're completely screwed.
[bolverk] In charge of the governor, I suppose. Listen, if you have something to tell him, say it now. Otherwise you're on your own.
/=Bolverk leaves with Eyvind, who goes willingly, signaling that he's fine.=/
[bolverk] Mender, come along. We're going to go see the governor.
[bolverk] The menders finally noticed what was going on, huh? Then we're either saved or completely screwed.
[bolverk] You didn't go to get a mender. Where's the mead?
[iver rook] And when Bellower gets here, he's going to walk right through this place without even breaking his stride.
[iver rook] Did you notice the city guards when we came in?
[iver rook] I have a feeling the Ravens are all they've got left. Something serious went down.
[iver rook] I'm not worried about Eyvind. I'm worried about the army of refugees we brought, who don't belong here.
[iver rook] It depends on who they're working for. Hopefully it really is the governor and not someone trying to strongarm their way into his seat.
[iver rook] This is nothing like Frostvellr. The one in bearskin is probably leading the Ravens.
[iver rook] We ought to go to the docks and see what our options are. In case we need to leave quickly.
[rook] Faen. This is just like Frostvellr all over again.
[rook] I guess we wait for Eyvind to tell us. If he comes back.
[rook] I'm Rook. We've come a long ways, some as far as Skogr. Are you in charge here?
[rook] Let's keep that to ourselves for now. So, the docks...
[rook] Ravens? Is that good or bad?
[rook] What guards?
[rook] You're probably right. Nobody ever uttered a nice thing about Boersgard. So what now?
/=Sigbjorn shrugs apologetically.=/
[sigbjorn] You may be interested to know they brought a mender.
{skip}
{skip} mark1=rook mark2=bolverk mark3=iver mark4=sigbjorn
